languages.text: "И в любом случае Арбитес больше никогда не станут вмешиваться в дела фон Валанциус". {n}Взгляд Соломона темнеет.{/n} "Другие династии отметят это, и почти наверняка откажутся подчиняться Адептус Арбитес. Нас ждут тяжелые времена".

traits.locale_text: "И в любом случае Арбитес больше {d|Encyclopedia:VC_UntouchableDinastyDecision}никогда не станут вмешиваться в дела фон Валанциус{/d}". {n}Взгляд Соломона темнеет.{/n} "Другие династии отметят это, и почти наверняка откажутся подчиняться Лекс Империалис. Нас ждут тяжелые времена".

languages.text: "Whatever lies ahead, the Arbites will not interfere in von Valancius matters again." {n}Solomorne's gaze darkens.{/n} "Once the other dynasties take notice, they will almost certainly refuse to cooperate with the Adeptus Arbites. These will be trying times."
languages.original_text: "И в любом случае Арбитес больше никогда не станут вмешиваться в дела фон Валанциус". {n}Взгляд Соломона темнеет.{/n} "Другие династии отметят это, и почти наверняка откажутся подчиняться Адептус Арбитес. Нас ждут тяжелые времена".

traits.locale_text: "Whatever lies ahead, the Arbites will not interfere in von Valancius matters again." {n}Solomorne's gaze darkens.{/n} "Once the other dynasties take notice, they will almost certainly refuse to obey the Lex Imperialis. These will be trying times."

"Whatever lies ahead, the Arbites will not interfere in von Valancius matters again." {n}Solomorne's gaze darkens.{/n} "Once the other dynasties take notice, they will almost certainly refuse to obey the Lex Imperialis. These will be trying times."

"Whatever lies ahead, the Arbites will not interfere in von Valancius matters again." {n}Solomorne's gaze darkens.{/n} "Once the other dynasties take notice, they will almost certainly refuse to obey the Lex. These will be trying times."

"Whatever lies ahead, the Arbites will not interfere in von Valancius matters again." {n}Solomorne's gaze darkens.{/n} "Once the other dynasties take notice, they will almost certainly refuse to obey the Lex. These will be trying times."

"Whatever lies ahead, the Arbites will not interfere in von Valancius matters again." {n}Solomorne's gaze darkens.{/n} "Once the other dynasties take notice, they will almost certainly refuse to cooperate with the Adeptus Arbites. These will be trying times."

"Whatever lies ahead, the Arbites will not interfere in von Valancius matters again." {n}Solomorne's gaze darkens.{/n} "Once the other dynasties take notice, they will almost certainly refuse to cooperate with the Adeptus Arbites. These will be trying times."

languages.text: 「この先どんなことがあろうと、高等裁定局がフォン・ヴァランシウス家の問題に干渉することは二度とありません」{n}ソロモーンの眼差しが陰を帯びた。{/n}「他の王朝がそのことに気づけば、彼らもおそらくアデプトゥス・アルビテスと協力を拒むようになるでしょう。これからは、試練の時です」
languages.original_text: "Whatever lies ahead, the Arbites will not interfere in von Valancius matters again." {n}Solomorne's gaze darkens.{/n} "Once the other dynasties take notice, they will almost certainly refuse to cooperate with the Adeptus Arbites. These will be trying times."

traits.locale_text: 「この先どんなことがあろうと、高等裁定局がフォン・ヴァランシウス家の問題に干渉することは二度とありません」{n}ソロモーンの眼差しが陰を帯びた。{/n}「他の王朝がそのことに気づけば、彼らもおそらくレックス・インペリアへの服従を拒むようになるでしょう。これからは、試練の時です」

languages.text: "Was auch kommt, die Arbites werden sich nicht mehr in die Angelegenheiten derer von Valancius einmischen." {n}Solomornes Blick verfinstert sich.{/n} "Sobald die anderen Dynastien davon erfahren, werden sie sich ziemlich sicher weigern, mit den Adeptus Arbites zu kooperieren. Vor uns liegen herausfordernde Zeiten."
languages.original_text: "Whatever lies ahead, the Arbites will not interfere in von Valancius matters again." {n}Solomorne's gaze darkens.{/n} "Once the other dynasties take notice, they will almost certainly refuse to cooperate with the Adeptus Arbites. These will be trying times."

traits.locale_text: "Was auch kommt, die Arbites werden sich nicht mehr in die Angelegenheiten derer von Valancius einmischen." {n}Solomornes Blick verfinstert sich.{/n} "Sobald die anderen Dynastien davon erfahren, werden sie sich ziemlich sicher weigern, mit den Adeptus Arbites zu kooperieren. Vor uns liegen herausfordernde Zeiten."

languages.text: « Qu'importe ce que l'avenir nous réserve, l'Arbites n'interférera plus dans les affaires des von Valancius, {n}déclare Solomorne, le regard sombre.{/n} Quand les autres dynasties s'en apercevront, elles ne manqueront pas de coopérer avec l'Adeptus Arbites. Nous vivrons alors des temps difficiles. »
languages.original_text: "Whatever lies ahead, the Arbites will not interfere in von Valancius matters again." {n}Solomorne's gaze darkens.{/n} "Once the other dynasties take notice, they will almost certainly refuse to cooperate with the Adeptus Arbites. These will be trying times."

traits.locale_text: « Qu'importe ce que l'avenir nous réserve, l'Arbites n'interférera plus dans les affaires des von Valancius, {n}déclare Solomorne, le regard sombre.{/n} Quand les autres dynasties s'en apercevront, elles ne manqueront pas de coopérer avec l'Adeptus Arbites. Nous vivrons alors des temps difficiles. »

languages.text: «Independientemente de lo que nos depare el destino, el Arbites no volverá a interferir en los asuntos de la casa von Valancius». {n}La expresión de Solomorne se ensombrece.{/n} «Cuando las demás dinastías se den cuenta, es casi seguro que se negarán a cooperar con el Adeptus Arbites. Serán tiempos difíciles».
languages.original_text: "Whatever lies ahead, the Arbites will not interfere in von Valancius matters again." {n}Solomorne's gaze darkens.{/n} "Once the other dynasties take notice, they will almost certainly refuse to cooperate with the Adeptus Arbites. These will be trying times."

traits.locale_text: «Independientemente de lo que nos depare el destino, el Arbites no volverá a interferir en los asuntos de la casa von Valancius». {n}La expresión de Solomorne se ensombrece.{/n} «Cuando las demás dinastías se den cuenta, es casi seguro que se negarán a cooperar con el Adeptus Arbites. Serán tiempos difíciles».

languages.text: “无论接下来发生什么事情，帝国法务部恐怕都再也不会插手冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的事务了。”{n}索罗蒙的目光黯淡下来。{/n}“一旦其他行商浪人王朝意识到这一点，他们恐怕再也不会与法务部继续合作了。接下来的日子，恐怕会很煎熬。”
languages.original_text: "Whatever lies ahead, the Arbites will not interfere in von Valancius matters again." {n}Solomorne's gaze darkens.{/n} "Once the other dynasties take notice, they will almost certainly refuse to cooperate with the Adeptus Arbites. These will be trying times."

traits.locale_text: “无论接下来发生什么事情，帝国法务部恐怕都再也不会插手冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的事务了。”{n}索罗蒙的目光黯淡下来。{/n}“一旦其他行商浪人王朝意识到这一点，他们恐怕再也不会与法务部继续合作了。接下来的日子，恐怕会很煎熬。”

languages.text: "Yarınlar bize ne gösterirse göstersin Arbites, von Valancius meselelerine bir daha karışmayacak." {n}Solomorne'un bakışları kararıyor.{/n} "Diğer hanedanlıklar bu durumu fark ettiğinde Adeptus Arbites'le iş birliği yapmayı kuvvetle muhtemel reddedecektir. Zor günlerden geçeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "Whatever lies ahead, the Arbites will not interfere in von Valancius matters again." {n}Solomorne's gaze darkens.{/n} "Once the other dynasties take notice, they will almost certainly refuse to cooperate with the Adeptus Arbites. These will be trying times."

traits.locale_text: "Yarınlar bize ne gösterirse göstersin Arbites, von Valancius meselelerine bir daha karışmayacak." {n}Solomorne'un bakışları kararıyor.{/n} "Diğer hanedanlıklar bu durumu fark ettiğinde Adeptus Arbites'le iş birliği yapmayı kuvvetle muhtemel reddedecektir. Zor günlerden geçeceğiz."

languages.original_text: "Whatever lies ahead, the Arbites will not interfere in von Valancius matters again." {n}Solomorne's gaze darkens.{/n} "Once the other dynasties take notice, they will almost certainly refuse to cooperate with the Adeptus Arbites. These will be trying times."
